result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sergio Ismael Sosa-Acevedo

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Minutes:  15CM1467/15CT465.  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Marc Christopher.  Spanish interpreter - Leo Martin.  Cases are resolved.  

15CT465 - deft pleads guilty; found guilty by the Court.  Sentencing arguments made.  Deft fined $50 plus costs.  Bond to apply.  Balance due in 30 days.  In default, 1 day work crew or 1 day KCJ.  DNA ordered; notice given to deft.

15CM1467 - case dismissed & read-in on State's motion.

ADDRESS INFO for Sergio Ismael Sosa-Acevedo
Current: 3210  S 12th St, Milwaukee, WI 53215 United States  (Effective: 01-06-2016)
Prior: 1942 W Burnham St, Milwaukee, WI 53204
Voluntary Appearance/Initial  Canceled warrant with Casitty/Gina at 140 p.m.

126pm / Recalled 129pm  Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Marc Christopher.  Leo Martin, spanish interpreter, appeared with the defendant.  Clerk JThwing. Minutes:  Warrant vacated.  Plea of Not Guilty entered.  Deft demands jury trial.  Referred to Br.3 for further proceedings on 1/20/16 @ 11am.  $1500  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).  kmk
voluntary appearance scheduled for 01-06-16 at 1pm Intake.   DA notified.
and witness list filed by the State
